Item_Vera_RaceToken.name: Race point
Item_Vera_RaceToken.description: Obtained by participating in group races.
Item_Vera_RaceToken.source: Used to unlock some race cars

Item_Gold.name: Gold
Item_Gold.description: This coin, minted from tin and gold, is currently the most popular currency across the land.

Item_vigor.name: Vitality
Item_vigor.description: Wanderer's vitality that replenishes every day. Can be used to participate in various events.
Item_vigor.source: Can be used to participate in various events.

Item_MedalofValor_1.name: Warrior badge I
Item_MedalofValor_1.description: An exquisite badge symbolizing valor, skill, and honor, all of which are not bought, but earned.
Item_MedalofValor_1.source: Obtained from Apophis boss chests, Heirs of Aida enemy drops, and password boxes. For redeeming rewards in the Warrior Store.

Item_MedalofValor_2.name: Warrior badge II
Item_MedalofValor_2.description: An exquisite badge symbolizing valor, skill, and honor, all of which are not bought, but earned.
Item_MedalofValor_2.source: Obtained from Frost Bot boss chests, Ravager enemy drops, and password chests. For redeeming rewards in the Warrior Store.

Blindbox_coin_01.name: Spring Stamp
Blindbox_coin_01.description: Stamps come with the apricity giftbox. It's always a ritual to collect the stamps and apply them.
Blindbox_coin_01.source: Buy Mystery Boxes to get the spring stamp. The stamp can be used to exchange goods at the Spring Market.

Blindbox_coin_02.name: Proof of Light
Blindbox_coin_02.description: Commemorative coupons for the Liuguang Motorshow. Hope you can find the most desirable treasures there.
Blindbox_coin_02.source: Gifted each time you open the Wheel of Light giftbox. Can be used to redeem items at the Expo Store.

mount_006_coin.name: Exhibition Coupon
mount_006_coin.description: A free coupon given to visitors of the Liuguang Motorshow. All experience is worthy of being remembered.
mount_006_coin.source: A voucher that can be used to exchange for the Meteoric line of vehicles. Collect a certain number of them to exchange for Meteoric vehicles.

Item_Reputation1.name: Bounty EXP
Item_Reputation1.description: Made out of special metal and represents the contributions from the wanders of Aida to this planet. Worth endeavoring for.
Item_Reputation1.source: Gain Bounty EXP to raise Bounty level and receive more rewarding Bounty Missions.

Item_Reputation2.name: Banges bounty coin
Item_Reputation2.description: Minted with unique craftsmanship, featuring a relief of an anchor. Can be used to exchange for special items.
Item_Reputation2.source: Can be used as a reward for the bounty hunters who have completed Bounty Missions at Banges Port and to purchase special items from vendors.

Item_Reputation3.name: Navia bounty coin
Item_Reputation3.description: Minted with unique craftsmanship, featuring a relief of a mechanical windmill. Can be used to exchange for special items.
Item_Reputation3.source: Can be used as a reward for the bounty hunters who have completed Bounty Missions in the Navia region and to purchase special items from vendors.

Item_Reputation4.name: Banges bounty coin
Item_Reputation4.description: Minted with unique craftsmanship, featuring a relief of an anchor. Can be used to exchange for special items.
Item_Reputation4.source: Can be used as a reward for the bounty hunters who have completed Bounty Missions at Banges Port and to purchase special items from vendors.

Item_Reputation5.name: Banges bounty coin
Item_Reputation5.description: Minted with unique craftsmanship, featuring a relief of an anchor. Can be used to exchange for special items.
Item_Reputation5.source: Can be used as a reward for the bounty hunters who have completed Bounty Missions at Banges Port and to purchase special items from vendors.

item_GuildMeritorious.name: Merit
item_GuildMeritorious.description: Obtained from Crew events to redeem items in the Crew Store.

Item_Guildcapital.name: Crew Fund
Item_Guildcapital.description: Obtained through daily Crew activities and donations.

Item_Diamond.name: Tanium
Item_Diamond.description: Stable crystals, most commonly used for energy supply. One of the currencies redeemable for items in the Store.
Item_Diamond.source: Redeemable for items in the Store.

Item_FakeDiamond.name: Dark Crystal
Item_FakeDiamond.description: Contains unstable energy and is sometimes used as a power source. One of the currencies redeemable for items in the Store.
Item_FakeDiamond.source: Redeemable for items in the Store.

EquipFragment.name: Base Chip
EquipFragment.description: Raw material processed through complex procedures for chip production. Redeemable for Matrix chips.

WeaponFragment.name: Black Gold
WeaponFragment.description: Token forged by smiths from old Omnium weapons. Circulated only in special markets. Redeemable for weapons.
WeaponFragment.source: Can be used to exchange for weapons at the Weapon Store.

EquipFragment_UP1.name: Overclocking Chip (Red Lotus)
EquipFragment_UP1.description: Raw material processed through complex procedures for specific chip production. Redeemable for Matrix chips.
EquipFragment_UP1.source: Exchange for limited-edition Matrices <Red>(converted to base chips in equal value after Limited Order is over)</>.

EquipFragment_UP2.name: Overclocking Chip (Blaze)
EquipFragment_UP2.description: Raw material processed through complex procedures for specific chip production. Redeemable for Matrix chips.
EquipFragment_UP2.source: Exchange for limited-edition Matrices <Red>(converted to base chips in equal value after Limited Order is over)</>.

Raw material processed through complex procedures for specific chip production. Redeemable for limited Matrix chips.
â€”So I can share all the clear night full of stars with everyone...

EquipFragment_UP19.description: Raw material processed through complex procedures for specific chip production. Redeemable for Matrix chips.
EquipFragment_UP19.source: Exchange for limited-edition Matrices <Red>(converted to base chips in equal value after Limited Order is over)</>.

EquipFragment_UP20.name: Overclocking Chip (Constant)
EquipFragment_UP20.description: Raw material processed through complex procedures for specific chip production. Redeemable for Matrix chips.
EquipFragment_UP20.source: Can be used to exchange for Matrix chips at the Matrix Store.

WeaponFragment_UP1.name: Flame gold (Red Lotus)
WeaponFragment_UP1.description: Token forged by smiths from specific recycled Omnium weapons. More like an artifact than a currency that circulates in a special channel.
WeaponFragment_UP1.source: Exchange for limited-edition weapons <Red>(converted to black gold in equal value after Limited Order is over)</>.

WeaponFragment_UP2.name: Flame Gold (Blaze)
WeaponFragment_UP2.description: Token forged by smiths from specific recycled Omnium weapons. More like an artifact than a currency that circulates in a special channel.
WeaponFragment_UP2.source: Exchange for limited-edition weapons <Red>(converted to black gold in equal value after Limited Order is over)</>.

WeaponFragment_UP9.name: Flame Gold (Shadow)
WeaponFragment_UP9.description:
Token forged by smiths from specific recycled Omnium weapons. More like an artifact than a currency that circulates in a special channel. Redeemable for limited weapons.
Dazzling lights refracted endlessly yet frighteningly never fade away.
WeaponFragment_UP9.source: Exchange for limited-edition weapons <Red>(converted to black gold in equal value after Limited Order is over)</>.

WeaponFragment_UP19.source: Exchange for limited-edition weapons <Red>(converted to black gold in equal value after Limited Order is over)</>.

WeaponFragment_UP20.name: Flame Gold (Constant)
WeaponFragment_UP20.description: Token forged by smiths from specific recycled Omnium weapons. More like an artifact than a currency that circulates in a special channel.
WeaponFragment_UP20.source: Can be used to exchange for weapons at the Weapon Store.

GenePointItem_Attack.name: Originum (Attack)
GenePointItem_Attack.description: A mysterious byproduct of Omnium radiation research that affects the evolution of creatures with a purpose. After years of research and optimization, it can now be safely used on the human body.
GenePointItem_Attack.source: A necessity to activate enhanced Flairs. When a Relic is fully developed, Relics and shards with the same name can be dismantled into Originum.

GenePointItem_Assist.name: Originum (Support)
GenePointItem_Assist.description: A mysterious byproduct of Omnium radiation research that affects the evolution of creatures with a purpose. After years of research and optimization, it can now be safely used on the human body.
GenePointItem_Assist.source: A necessity to activate enhanced Flairs. When a Relic is fully developed, Relics and shards with the same name can be dismantled into Originum.

GenePointItem_Def.name: Originum (Feature)
GenePointItem_Def.description: A mysterious byproduct of Omnium radiation research that affects the evolution of creatures with a purpose. After years of research and optimization, it can now be safely used on the human body.
GenePointItem_Def.source: A necessity to activate enhanced Flairs. When a Relic is fully developed, Relics and shards with the same name can be dismantled into Originum.

Item_VeraCoin.name: Mira
Item_VeraCoin.description: The currency issued by and circulates in Mirroria. Can be used on vending machines, service stations, restaurants, and other facilities across Mirroria.
Item_VeraCoin.source: Can be used to purchase items in Mirroria.

Item_VeraCoinRare.name: Veron
Item_VeraCoinRare.description: Old Mirroria currency that is already out of circulation. It's said that you can still use these coins on some gachapon machines.
Item_VeraCoinRare.source: Can be used on out-of-market gachapon machines.

Item_Achievement.name: Achievement
Item_Achievement.source: Points gained after accomplishing an achievement. Accumulate achievement and claim rewards on the achievement page.

Item_RegressionCoin.name: Raid Coin
Item_RegressionCoin.description: Minted with unique craftsmanship, featuring a mechanical windmill relief.
Item_RegressionCoin.source: Can be exchanged for items in the Return Shop.

Item_PrimaryEnergy_1.name: Composite Energy
Item_PrimaryEnergy_1.description: Primary products of the energy collector, construction material in the Artificial Island region

Item_PrimaryEnergy_2.name: Energy Crystal Dust
Item_PrimaryEnergy_2.description: Miniature energy crystals which are generated when using a suppressor. Possesses slight recovery value.
Item_PrimaryEnergy_2.source: Can be exchanged for goods at the Crystal Dust Store.

Item_PrimaryEnergy_3.name: Energy Crystal Dust
Item_PrimaryEnergy_3.description: Miniature energy crystals which are generated when using a suppressor. Possesses slight recovery value.
Item_PrimaryEnergy_3.source: Can be exchanged for goods in the Crystal Dust Store after reaching Wanderer Level 40.

Item_PrimaryEnergy_4.name: Energy Crystal Dust
Item_PrimaryEnergy_4.description: Miniature energy crystals which are generated when using a suppressor. Possesses slight recovery value.
Item_PrimaryEnergy_4.source: Can be exchanged for goods in the Crystal Dust Store after reaching Wanderer Lv. 50.

Item_PrimaryEnergy_5.name: Spacetime Crystal Dust
Item_PrimaryEnergy_5.description: Crystal dust that escaped from the trajectory of spacetime. Seems to be able to affect the stability of spacetime fragments.
Item_PrimaryEnergy_5.source: Can be used to exchange goods in the Spacetime Store.

Item_PrimaryEnergy_6.name: Spacetime Crystal Fragments
Item_PrimaryEnergy_6.description: These fragments floating in the trajectory of spacetime operations are the products of the collapse of shattered spacetime.
Item_PrimaryEnergy_6.source: Can be used to exchange goods in the Spacetime Store.

Item_LifeCrystal.name: Life Crystal
Item_LifeCrystal.description: Dropped by creatures on the Artificial Island

Item_AssistContribution.name: Support points
Item_AssistContribution.description: Awarded to those who helped new Wanderers. Imprinted with an image for mutual support. Join Team Support System to get.
Item_AssistContribution.source: Can be exchanged for goods in the Support Store.

item_Regression_AssistContribution.name: Return Support Points
item_Regression_AssistContribution.description: Awarded to those who helped return Executors. Obtain by teaming up with returning Executors and participating in gameplay.
item_Regression_AssistContribution.source: Used to redeem rewards in the Store

HomeOre.name: Metal Material
HomeOre.description: A construction material obtained from the Machine Pod and creatures outside the camp.
HomeOre.source: Used to upgrade buildings, redeem items at the Exchange Store, and fuse at the Workshop.

HomeRattan.name: Energy Material
HomeRattan.description: A construction material obtained from the Pawpaw House and creatures outside the camp.
HomeRattan.source: Used to upgrade buildings, redeem items at the Exchange Store, and fuse at the Workshop.

HomeTwigs.name: Accessory Materials
HomeTwigs.description: A construction material obtained from the Turtle House and creatures outside the camp.
HomeTwigs.source: Used to upgrade buildings, redeem items at the Exchange Store, and fuse at the Workshop.

HomeFishBones.name: Composite Materials
HomeFishBones.description: A rare construction material dropped by the boss of Artificial Island.
HomeFishBones.source: Used to upgrade buildings, redeem items at the Exchange Store, and fuse at the Workshop.

HomeShell.name: Home reserve 1
HomeShell.description: Construction material from Artificial Island - Turtle House
HomeShell.source: Used to upgrade buildings, redeem items at the Exchange Store, and fuse at the Workshop.

HomePumpkin.name: Fiber Material
HomePumpkin.description: A construction material obtained from the Pumpkin House and creatures outside the camp.
HomePumpkin.source: Used to upgrade buildings, redeem items at the Exchange Store, and fuse at the Workshop.

HomeMeat.name: Supply Materials
HomeMeat.description: A construction material obtained from the Kitty House and creatures outside the camp.
HomeMeat.source: Used to upgrade buildings, redeem items at the Exchange Store, and fuse at the Workshop.

HomeFish.name: Quality Materials
HomeFish.description: A rare construction material dropped by the boss of Artificial Island.
HomeFish.source: Used to upgrade buildings, redeem items at the Exchange Store, and fuse at the Workshop.

HomeShellfish.name: Tech Store Token
HomeShellfish.description: A universal token of Banges Tech. Obtain by exchanging materials in the Exchange Store.
HomeShellfish.source: Used in the Exchange Store to exchange for rare items.

item_sharephotocoin.name: Amusement park
item_sharephotocoin.description: Obtained by playing amusement facilities on the Cetus Island. Use them to exchange for Cetus Island exclusive rewards at Enfi on the island.
item_sharephotocoin.source: Exchange for Cetus Island exclusive rewards

Item_Incarnation_01.name: Offering points
Item_Incarnation_01.description: Special tokens minted by Hykros to encourage collecting mana bio samples.
Item_Incarnation_01.source: Trade in mana bio samples for offering points that are redeemable for rewards in the Commissary.

Item_Enlightenment.name: Aidan Coin
Item_Enlightenment.description: Event Currency for Road of Strife
Item_Enlightenment.source: Participate in the Path of Enlightenment event to get it, which can be used to redeem rewards in the Event Store

Item_Enlightenment_02.name: Star scatter
Item_Enlightenment_02.description: Fine shards of stars that refract the light from outer space.
Item_Enlightenment_02.source: Participate in the Starcrossed Sky event to get it, which can be used to redeem rewards in the Event Store

Item_ChildrensDayCoin.name: Bubbles
Item_ChildrensDayCoin.source: Use to redeem rewards from the Event Store

Item_HiveJumpCoin_01.name: Enigmatic Badge
Item_HiveJumpCoin_01.description: The badge given to the HOTTA Studio's Enigmatic Lattice event participants. Come one, come all!
Item_HiveJumpCoin_01.source: Participate in the Enigmatic Lattice event to get it, which can be used to redeem rewards in the Store

Item_SummerCoin_01.name: Heat Wave Coin
Item_SummerCoin_01.description: A token obtained from Graceday celebration in Banges Port. The passion of Banges's residents that handcrafted them still remains within them. As Graceday's official currency, they can be exchanged for rewards at the booths in all major markets.
Item_SummerCoin_01.source: Used to redeem rewards in the Event Store.

Item_SummerCoin_02.name: Heat Wave Coin
Item_SummerCoin_02.description: A token obtained from Graceday celebration in Banges Port. The passion of Banges's residents that handcrafted them still remains within them. As Graceday's official currency, they can be exchanged for rewards at the booths in all major markets.
Item_SummerCoin_02.source: Used to redeem rewards in the Event Store.

Item_Aida_token.name: Balance Token
Item_Aida_token.description: Has the current ecological environment stabilized?
Item_Aida_token.source: Event item. Can be redeemed for goods at the event store during the event

Item_Aida_token_02.name: Balance Token
Item_Aida_token_02.description: Has the current ecological environment stabilized?
Item_Aida_token_02.source: Event item. Can be redeemed for goods at the event store during the event

Item_Aida_photo_token.name: Encrypted Disk
Item_Aida_photo_token.description: A heavily encrypted disk with critical data. Maybe someone in Hykros can crack it...?
Item_Aida_photo_token.source: Activity item that can be used to exchange goods at the Keepsake Store during the event.

activation1.name: Activation Core I
activation1.description: A rare live bio-sample, with great research value.
activation1.source: Used to redeem rewards in the Event Store.

activation2.name: Revitalized Energy Body
activation2.description: Revitalized energy body from the defeated raiding target. It may be of great interest to the researchers at Hykros.
activation2.source: Used to redeem rewards in the Event Store.

Item_OrienteeringCoin_01.name: Pacemaker Emblem
Item_OrienteeringCoin_01.description: The emblem is given to the HOTTA Studio's Mirroria Tour event participants. Appreciate Mirroria's beauty from a whole new perspective.
Item_OrienteeringCoin_01.source: Can be used to exchange goods in the Mirroria Tour Event Store.

item_GreatRegression_coin.name: Proof of Stellarway
item_GreatRegression_coin.description: Executors returning from the break, I hope all of you haven't forgotten how to fight, and better believe that all efforts shall be rewarded.
item_GreatRegression_coin.source: Can be exchanged for goods at the Stellarway Store.

hopkins1.name: Gold-backed card
hopkins1.description: Apparently accepted as currency at the Banges Black Market.
hopkins1.source: Obtain by joining the Hopkins order event

hopkins2.name: Proof of credit
hopkins2.description: You've got to win Hopkins' trust if you want the best goods from his Black Market. Prove yourself a worthy customer.
hopkins2.source: Obtain by joining the Hopkins order event

Item_Incarnation_02.name: Proof of Contribution
Item_Incarnation_02.description: The certificate made by the Hykros Logistics Department, which records the efforts and contributions of the Executor.
Item_Incarnation_02.source: An event item. Used to exchange for goods at the Journey Store during the event.
